line.originaltext: 2 eggs
1/4 cup water
6 tablespoons all-purpose flour
1/2 teaspoon salt
2 tablespoons chopped onion
1 tablespoon butter
1 tablespoon all-purpose flour
1 cup milk
1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
line.annotation: create_ing(ing8, "1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, divided")

line.originaltext: 1 1/2 teaspoons Dijon mustard
1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce
1/4 teaspoon pepper
1/8 teaspoon salt
2 cups frozen chopped broccoli, thawed
line.annotation: create_ing(ing13, "2 cups frozen chopped broccoli, thawed")

line.originaltext: For batter, combine the eggs, water, flour and salt in a blender.
For batter, combine the eggs, water, flour and salt in a blender.
For batter, combine the eggs, water, flour and salt in a blender.
Cover and process until smooth; let stand for 15 minutes.
line.annotation: mix(ing14, t0, ing15, "smooth batter", "cover and process until smooth")

line.originaltext: Cover and process until smooth; let stand for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender.
Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender.
Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender.
line.annotation: cook(ing16, t1, ing17, "sauteed onions", "saute until tender")

line.originaltext: Stir in flour until blended.
line.annotation: combine({ing17, ing6}, ing18, "floury onions", "stir in until blended")

line.originaltext: Gradually stir in milk.
line.annotation: combine({ing18, ing7}, ing19, "milky onions", "gradually stir in")

line.originaltext: Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until slightly thickened.
line.annotation: cook(ing19, t1, ing20, "boiled onions", "bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly; cook and stir for two minutes or until slightly thick ")

line.originaltext: Reduce heat to low.
Reduce heat to low.
Stir in 1/2 cup cheese, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, pepper and salt until cheese is melted.
line.annotation: separate(ing8, ing21, "1/2 cup cheese", ing22, "1/2 cup cheese", "")

line.originaltext: Stir in 1/2 cup cheese, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, pepper and salt until cheese is melted.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11, ing12, ing20, ing21, ing9}, ing23, "cheesy onions", "stir in")

line.originaltext: Stir in 1/2 cup cheese, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, pepper and salt until cheese is melted.
line.annotation: cook(ing23, t1, ing24, "melty cheese mix", "until cheese is melted")

line.originaltext: Stir in broccoli.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing24}, ing25, "broccoli cheese mix", "stir in")

line.originaltext: Cover; keep warm.
Heat a lightly greased 8-in. nonstick skillet; pour 2 tablespoons batter into the center of skillet.
Heat a lightly greased 8-in. nonstick skillet; pour 2 tablespoons batter into the center of skillet.
Heat a lightly greased 8-in. nonstick skillet; pour 2 tablespoons batter into the center of skillet.
line.annotation: separate(ing15, ing26, "2 tablespoons batter", ing27, "rest of batter", "")

line.originaltext: Heat a lightly greased 8-in. nonstick skillet; pour 2 tablespoons batter into the center of skillet.
Lift and tilt pan to evenly coat bottom.
line.annotation: set(t2, "lift and tilt pan to evenly coat bottom")

line.originaltext: Cook until top appears dry; turn and cook 15-20 seconds longer.
Cook until top appears dry; turn and cook 15-20 seconds longer.
Cook until top appears dry; turn and cook 15-20 seconds longer.
line.annotation: cook(ing28, t2, ing29, "done crepe", "turn and cook 15-20 seconds longer")

line.originaltext: Remove to a wire rack.
Remove to a wire rack.
Repeat with remaining batter, greasing skillet as needed.
line.annotation: cook(ing27, t2, ing30, "crepes", "cook rest of batter as above")

line.originaltext: Repeat with remaining batter, greasing skillet as needed.
Spoon about 1/2 cup filling down the center of each crepe; roll up.
line.annotation: combine({ing25, ing31}, ing32, "filled crepes", "spoon about 1/2 cup filling down the center of each crepe")

line.originaltext: Spoon about 1/2 cup filling down the center of each crepe; roll up.
Place seam side down in an ungreased 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dish.
Place seam side down in an ungreased 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dish.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 5-7 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 5-7 minutes or until cheese is melted.
line.annotation: cook(ing33, t5, ing34, "done crepes", "at 350 F for 5-7 minutes or until cheese is melted")

line.originaltext: Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 5-7 minutes or until cheese is melted.
